text: Japeuthria is a monospecific genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Buccinidae, the true whelks. ==Species== Species within the genus Japeuthria include: * Japeuthria ferrea (Reeve, 1847) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Buccinidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Japeuthria
